p: Quarter foremilk samples were collected weekly during the trial. All samples were collected immediately before regular milking. The milk collection followed the methodology described by Simões et al. [ 20] and the samples were sent to the Animal Health Laboratory located at the Institute of Agricultural Sciences of UFMG. Subsequently, the microorganisms were isolated and identified following Brito’s methodology [ 21] and the microbiological identification of the isolates was performed [ 20- 22].
